<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Underworld Investigator](/Feats.aspx?ID=5939) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 107 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your work as an investigator makes you familiar with the criminal element. You might be a criminal yourself, or you might have gained an understanding of how they operate from the outside. You become trained in [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41), and you gain your Pursue a Lead investigation bonus to [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) checks to investigate a case (such as checks to [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=2410) a clue from a suspect or [Pick a Lock](/Actions.aspx?ID=2412) to open a safe with damning documents).
name: Underworld Investigator
